alert.note: Alert for Western Grant; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 19 at 2:14AM EST until November 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected, especially at the ridgetops. * WHERE...Western Grant and Western Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero are also expected tonight, especially at the ridgetops.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
